summary: When the staff inside a renovated film studio finds a co-worker dead one morning, the pieces of a forty year puzzle add up to an angry ghost who has let the last person step inside her house. But will they ever get out alive?
cast: Billy Zane|Lacey Chabert|Matt Dallas|Danielle Harris|Richard Tyson|Christine Quinn|Allyn Carrell|Jennifer Korbin|Brina Palencia|Adam Whittington|Lynn Andrews III|Sophia Arias|John Franklin|Alisha Revel|Tina Ryker|Sara Bijan|David 'Shark' Fralick|Timothy Drummond|Ricardo Campbell|Ed Spila|Alin Bijan|Mojan Safavi|Erin Wilkerson|Taylor Kowald|Melissa Cordero|Taylor Tippins|Lily Bijan|Vicente Moctezuma|Erin Marie Garrett|Heather Palacio|June Weber|Tony Weber|Natalie Noe|Ron D. Thornton|Larkin Lindner|Contact Point's Megawatt|Tom Clayton|Tom Haney|Steve Fuentes|Adam Donaghey|Kevin Heath|Rosa Nichols|Claudia Lara|Connie Cheng|Heather Gillett|Josh Davis|Jill Horton|Eleanor T. Threatt
title: Ghost of Goodnight Lane
